turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Will you please order me a coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course! From where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I feel like some Tim Horton's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get me a large iced capp please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yum! What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's do a large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. Want anything special with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah I need an extra boost of energy so have them put an espresso shot in it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I don't blame you. Ok got it. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I want it to be hazelnut flavored as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That sounds so good. Anything else about the coffee, or anything to eat?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually some donuts sound really good too

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes they do! What kind?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I like just the old-fashioned glazed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh yeah those are delicious. How many?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's do 2, that way I'll have one for later. And that will be all

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect I'll be there shortly with your items.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome thanks so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not a problem!
